about_the_game:
Important note:

The game takes place inside a house, where you will have to discover the hidden mystery that lies in this fast-paced horror story.

The Maid is a first-person psychological horror game..

Environment

Feel the terror in my first person and live the experience of feeling loneliness and fear in your own skin.

The game guides you through the interior of a Victorian house where the presence of supernatural entities will leave you breathless. Walk through its long corridors, where darkness and your worst fears can become reality.

The theme of the game

For some reason you find yourself in a cold and damp basement, your memories and thoughts have led you there. You must advance in the story to discover the reason that has led you to that place. But be careful, you will not be alone.

Developer Comment:

The supernatural entity in this game may not harm you physically, but they may harm your psychology. It is our recommendation for people who are afraid of the dark, have heart problems, and are afraid of being alone. Play with caution.

name: The Maid

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Ryzen™ 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 950 or AMD Radeon™ R7 370
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Ryzen™ 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The Maid is a first-person psychological horror and mystery game that focuses on creating fear and tension in the player.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
